stories.text:
I saw in the most recent ‘those making $500/month’ that some sold digital products (templates/courses, etc.), for those of us not in the US,

1. What platform do use and why? I’ve seen appsumo, gumroad and what appeared to be self host/build in that post and related links off of it.

2. How are you getting paid ( through the platform/ through Stripe)

3. Can you move your content from your current platform or did the terms mean you cannot?

4. Any other advice?

Am I gonna make real money if the digital products are good (market will tell yes yes!) or is this something that only works with loyal followers or those with great creds?
stories.title: Ask HN: Creating and selling digital products 2022
